attributes.action: Give UK Childminders emergency funding if they have to close down amid COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
Parents feel so much happier when they found someone they can totally trust with their child, who knows them and their family personally. Taking your child to a childminder can be the next best thing to your own home.
We need the financial support from the government to secure our small business and our families.
attributes.background: If childminders are shut down in view of Covid-19, the Government should set up an emergency fund to ensure their survival and ensure that their finance and family do not suffer.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced various support measures, including the Self-employment Income Support Scheme. You can find more information here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/claim-a-grant-through-the-coronavirus-covid-19-self-employment-income-support-scheme

You can also find information about the support measures available to childcare and early years settings here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-early-years-and-childcare-closures/coronavirus-covid-19-early-years-and-childcare-closures

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
